newsitem.title: UK: Coda Group finance director Shay resigns.
newsitem.headline: Coda Group finance director Shay resigns.

text.p: Loss-making British business systems firm, the Coda Group Plc said on Monday that its finance director Ian Shay had resigned with immediate effect to pursue alternative opportunities.
The company said it was looking for a new finance director and until then the group's finance team would be looking after its accounting requirements.

The company did not say whether it had sacked Shay but said: "We intend to appoint a new finance director with appropriate experience and qualifications to take the group forward in the next phase of development".
Coda supplies financial and management information systems.
